title: Kim Kardashian shares cute video of her fourth child Psalm
text:
Kim Kardashian shared a darling video clip of her fourth child, Psalm, to her Instagram account on Friday.

The little boy, who is only four months old, was in all black as he laid in a crib with white sheets and blankets.

In the caption, the reality TV star - who will turn 39-years-old this month - said her second son is starting to look like his older brother Saint, aged three.

Her baby boy: Kim Kardashian shared a darling video clip of her fourth child, Psalm, to her Instagram account on Friday

Mini Saint: In the caption, the reality TV star - who will turn 39-years-old this month - said her second son is starting to look like his older brother Saint, aged three

The camera is focused on Psalm for several seconds as Kim, who is never seen in the clip, can be heard cooing over the little wonder.

'Hi cutie, look at my baby!' the KKW Beauty mogul says as clatter is heard in the background.

'Hi cutie, hi Psalm, you want to talk so badly!' she says as she laughs.

Mommy: 'Hi cutie, look at my baby!' the KKW Beauty mogul is heard saying as clatter is heard in the background. Kim shared this image this week

Psalm moves his arms around and at one point sticks his tongue out.

She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019.

The day before Kim shared a sweet snap with her eldest child North, six, while seated on a golden chair.

Matcher? Kim said he first started to look like Chicago. Here Chicago, right, is seen at home in an Instagram post from September

Her second child: Here Kim and Saint are seen in NYC in 2017 when he was a toddler

The Selfish author modeled slouchy boots while posing with North seated on her lap for the mother-daughter photo.

Kim looked incredible in black baggy bottoms that she tucked stylishly into her boots; she added a black top with a white accent along the top.

She wore her dark brunette tresses loose with pink nude lipstick on her full pout, adding smokey eye makeup to round out her look.

Stylish: The little boy, who is only four months old, was in all black as he laid in a crib with white sheets and blankets

Not chatting: 'Hi cutie, hi Pslam, you want to talk so badly!' she says as she laughs

Cutie pie: She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019

Kim posed while as she blew a kiss to the camera and North held up a peace sign; the duo posed on the gold chair, which sat in front of two ornate doors.

North wore a glittering look with gold shoes.

Kim and husband Kanye West are parents to four children together: North, Saint, three, Chicago, who turns two in January, and Psalm.

Kanye recently bought a ranch just outside of Cody, Wyoming, according to TMZ; the asking price was $14 million. It is not known how much Kanye shelled out, although the website noted he did not pay full price.

More kids: Later, Kylie Jenner shared a photo of Stormi, far right, playing with True (center), Chicago (far top left) and Dream (bottom left)

She feels blessed: The 22-year-old Jenner, who recently split from Travis Scott, said thank God for the kids

The ranch has eight lodging units, two freshwater lakes, meeting facilities and an event center; the property - called Monster Lake Ranch - is nine thousand acres. Kanye owns 4,500 acres of it and the rest is leased from the federal government, the outlet reported.

Kim shared a snap while spending time in Wyoming with Kanye and their children on September 17 while enjoying an outdoor meal during sunset.

Three days earlier, the brunette beauty shared a snap captioned 'Wyoming' with North and Chicago seated on a horse in a field with Kim holding on to the reins.

On Friday Kim and her sisters launched the website KardashianKloset.com where fans can buy their old designer clothes, shoes and bags.

Balmain and Versace purses went within the first hour.

Her mother Kris Jenner also had several items for sale by Fendi and Adidas.

So sweet: On Thursday, Kim shared a sweet snap while posing with her eldest child North, six, while seated on a golden chair
description: In the caption, the reality TV star - who will turn 39-years-old this month - said her second son is starting to look like his older brother Saint, aged three. She has four kids so far.
